subject: Re: WARNING!! WARNING!!
author: April Slaughter
full_text:
While I think it is always a good idea to keep a positive energy about
oneself, I honestly do not believe the box (in its many forms) is
anymore dangerous than other tools used in paranormal research. I have
never been harmed by a spirit, whether it be in working in EVP-ITC
research, or other phenomena and I too have been doing this a long time.
